text: Martin is an unincorporated community in northwestern Allendale County, South Carolina, United States. It lies along SC 125 northwest of the town of Allendale, the county seat of Allendale County.Rand McNally. The Road Atlas '08. Chicago: Rand McNally, 2008, p. 92. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in the United States Category:Settlements in South Carolina
title: Martin, South Carolina
